description:
Sometimes it's fun to fuck with people, tie them up, make them feel helpless, then toy with their emotions. That's what we do with Dragonlily in this smoking hot shoot.
We get her all fired up with foot worship, foot fucking, and toe sucking, then knock her down with strong jolts of electricity and psychological torment.
Update includes breath play, pussy and ass licking, anal play, spanking, whipping, flogging, electricity and more!
title: Dragonlily Exposed
